body_html: Thanks for your response. I see that cupti does not have a dedicated package für cuda 8.0 for Ubuntu 16.04 (https://packages.ubuntu.com/search?keywords=libcupti) and is not included in the main package. Still one might wish not to build tensorflow (thats what devel is for, right?), but still want to get run_metadata. libcupti.so is ~5.7MB, thus I see no issue to put it in the nondevel image.

body: Thanks for your response. I see that cupti does not have a dedicated package für cuda 8.0 for Ubuntu 16.04 (https://packages.ubuntu.com/search?keywords=libcupti) and is not included in the main package. Still one might wish not to build tensorflow (thats what devel is for, right?), but still want to get run_metadata. libcupti.so is ~5.7MB, thus I see no issue to put it in the nondevel image.
